channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Lisbon
channel.desc: Janina Ramirez and Alastair Sooke reveal Lisbon's fascinating history through its cobbled streets, steep hills, picturesque shoreline and cultural riches.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Da Vinci
channel.desc: Fiona Bruce uncovers the story of Leonardo da Vinci. She travels to Florence, Milan, Paris, Warsaw and to New York, where she is given an exclusive preview of a new Leonardo.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Planet Earth
channel.desc: Exploring tropical paradises and storm-ravaged icy polar seas.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Face the Music
channel.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against Joyce Grenfell, Richard Baker and David Attenborough. With guest musician Andrew Davis.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Biddy Baxter Story
channel.desc: Profile of the legendary Blue Peter editor Biddy Baxter, with contributions from former presenters of the programme.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Planet Earth
channel.desc: Documentary series which celebrates our planet in all its glory. David Attenborough reveals the greatest woodlands on earth, from the northern Taiga to Madagascar.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Good Life
channel.desc: Margo and Jerry persuade Tom and Barbara to stay in a luxurious flat for the night. How will Margo and Jerry cope with looking after the Goods' animals.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Yes Minister
channel.desc: Jim is handed responsibility for developing an integrated national transport policy.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Rikki
channel.desc: Celebrating a hundred years of Rikki Fulton, one of Scotland's most beloved comic actors. The story of his extraordinary life, told by his friends and the people he inspired.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Scotch and Wry
channel.desc: Hogmanay comedy from Rikki Fulton and his team - Gregor Fisher, Juliet Cadzow, Tony Roper, Annette Staines and Barbara Dickson.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Last Battle of the Vikings
channel.desc: Documentary. Marine archaeologist Dr Jon Henderson tells the story of the Norsemen in Scotland, visiting archaeological sites across Scotland and Norway.
